TopicTitle: what kind of sweet-as acessories should I get for the PC? (like a joystick or summin)

Articles.Content:
My bro is super obsessed with this, and the parents wanna to get him a joystick or summin for xmas so he can look cool as while he plays.

Found this on Ebay but I dunno if it'd work and the olds want summin cheaper:

http://www.ebay.com/itm/Flight-Simulator-Controller-Video-Game-Joystick-Throttle-Yoke-System-USB-Hub-/131346834535?pt=US_Video_Game_Controllers&hash=item1e94e1a467

Wanted to spend around a hundy bucks (oz dollars).

You cool catz got any ideas?
Well, The Saitek X52 is a nice joystick.
The Razer Nostromo is a nice cool-looking accessory which is very useful. Costs less than 100$.
Could always get one of those external fan controllers and look uber tech while doing nothing.
I have a Logitech Extreme 3d Pro for a stick. It's cheap, ($40) but does the job well.
